import sys;

if sys.byteorder!='little':
    print('Only little endian machines currently supported! bye bye ....');
    quit();

#import numpy as np;
import os;
from database import DBase;
from dbresult import DBQueryResult;
#from chemdbutilities.periodictableutils import full_periodic_table_filter;
from chemdistiller.scorers.totalscorefuntion import total_multiplicative_score;
from chemdistiller.filters.elementsfilter import CHNOPS_filter, CHNOPS_halogens_filter, ElementCompositionFilter;
from chemdistiller.filters.formulasfilter import FormulasFilter;
from chemdistiller.scorers.formulascorer.formulascorer import FormulaScorer;
from chemdistiller.scorers.elementscorer.elementscorer import ElementScorer;



[docs]class DBManager:
    
    def __init__(self, database_list_file=''):
        if database_list_file=='':
            subpath=os.getcwd();
            #print(subpath);
            if os.path.isfile(os.path.join(subpath,'databases.list')):
                database_list_file=os.path.join(subpath,'databases.list');
            elif os.path.isfile(os.path.abspath(os.path.join(subpath,'data/databases.list'))):
                database_list_file=os.path.abspath(os.path.join(subpath,'data/databases.list'));
            else:
                raise IOError('databases.list not found in %s or %s!'%(subpath,os.path.abspath(os.path.join(subpath,'Data'))));
                
        self.data_bases=[];
        self.initialize_databases(database_list_file);
        
    def __enter__(self):
        return self;


[docs]    def close(self):
        if self.data_bases:
            for db in self.data_bases:
                db.close();

        
    def __exit__(self, exc_type, exc_value, traceback):
        self.close();
        

[docs]    def initialize_databases(self, database_list_file):
        with open(database_list_file,'r') as f:
            for s in f:
                dbpath=os.path.abspath(s.replace('\n',''));
                #print(dbpath);
                dbase=DBase(dbpath);
                if dbase.db_format>0 and dbase.db_format<4:
                    self.data_bases.append(dbase);
                    self.data_bases[len(self.data_bases)-1].db_index=len(self.data_bases)-1;
                else:
                    print('%s - Wrong DB format. Ignored.'%dbpath);

                

[docs]    def get_database_names(self, dbindexes=[]):
        result=[];
        if dbindexes:
            for index in dbindexes:
                result.append(self.data_bases[index].db_name);
        else:
            for db in self.data_bases:
                result.append(db.db_name);
        return result;

    

[docs]    def get_database_fullnames(self, dbindexes=[]):

        if dbindexes:
            for index in dbindexes:
                result.append(self.data_bases[index].db_fullname);
        else:
            for db in self.data_bases:
                result.append(db.db_fullname);
        return result;

        return result;

    

[docs]    def get_database_groupnames(self, dbindexes=[]):        
        result=[];
        if dbindexes:
            for index in dbindexes:
                result.append(self.data_bases[index].db_groupname);
        else:
            for db in self.data_bases:
                result.append(db.db_groupname);
        return result;    

        

[docs]    def db_indexes_from_db_names(self, db_names_list, case_sensitive=False):
        result=[];
        if case_sensitive:
            for db_name in db_names_list:
                for db in self.data_bases:
                    if db.db_name==db_name:
                        result.append(db.db_index);
        else:
            for db_name in db_names_list:
                for db in self.data_bases:
                    if db.db_name.upper()==db_name.upper():
                        result.append(db.db_index);
        return result;

                


[docs]    def query_by_mz_scored(self, mz, deltappm, charge=0, db_indexes=[], filters=[], scorers=[], total_score=total_multiplicative_score, required_fields=set(), results_limit=0, save_memory=True):

        #required_fields=set();
        for s in scorers:
            required_fields.update(s.required_fields);
        for s in filters:
            required_fields.update(s.required_fields);

        result=DBQueryResult(results_limit);
        

        if db_indexes:
            #print('Indexes')
            for index in db_indexes:
                if save_memory:
                    result.add(self.data_bases[index], mz, deltappm, charge, filters, scorers, required_fields, total_score);
                else:
                    result.addbulk(self.data_bases[index], mz, deltappm, charge, filters, scorers, required_fields, total_score);                    
        else:
            for db in self.data_bases:
                #print(db.db_name)
                if save_memory:                
                    result.add(db, mz, deltappm, charge, filters, scorers, required_fields, total_score);
                else:
                    result.addbulk(db, mz, deltappm, charge, filters, scorers, required_fields, total_score);

        result.cleanup_results();

        return result;

    
if __name__=='__main__':   
     dbfile=os.path.abspath('../../tests/databases.list');
     
     print(dbfile);
     if os.path.isfile(dbfile):
         dbmanager=DBManager(dbfile);
         import time;
         t=time.time();
         test_formulas_filter=FormulasFilter('H4C4SO,H4C3SiO2');
         test_formula_scorer=FormulaScorer();
         test_formula_scorer.configure_scorer('H4C4SO,H4C3SiO2',[0.8,0.5],1.0);
         
         test_elements_scorer=ElementScorer();
         test_elements_scorer.configure_scorer({'S':0.1,'O':1.0,'Si':0.1});
         print(dbmanager.db_indexes_from_db_names(['PubChem','EMolecules']));
         
         result=dbmanager.query_by_mz_scored(100, 20, charge=0, db_indexes=dbmanager.db_indexes_from_db_names(['EMolecules','PubChem'],case_sensitive=True), filters=[test_formulas_filter], scorers=[test_formula_scorer,test_elements_scorer], required_fields=set(['Formula']), results_limit=20, save_memory=False);
         t=time.time()-t;
         print(len(result.mol_list));
         for i in result.mol_list:
             print(i['MZ'],i['DBIndex'],i['Formula'],dbmanager.data_bases[i['DBIndex']].db_name,i['Scores']);
         print(t);
         #print(len(dbmanager.data_bases));
         #for i in dbmanager.data_bases:
         #    print(i.db_name)
         dbmanager.close();
